name: Dodgem Royale
description:
Dodgem Royale is a 2D Survival Game where you need to out maneuver other Dodgem Drivers!

Personal Best Score tracked in Game.

Controls:

WASD/ Arrow Keys = Movement

Escape = Return to Menu

Future Changes:

- Multiplayer

- Different Arenas/Maps

- Better Audio

- Cosmetics

- Online Leaderboard

- Different Game modes

Please Leave Feedback, even a simple "Cool!" means a lot.

Enjoy!

Niall O'Brien / Jyrus UnCageD

Created for ScoreSpace Jam #13 🕹️
